A feasible cone prevents a nonpositive representation of the vertical vector.

lemma exists_pos_coeff_repr_vertical_of_feasible {n : Nat} {Sstar : Set ((Fin n Real) Real)} {x0 : Fin n Real} (hx0 : x0 intersectionOfHalfspaces (n := n) Sstar) (v : Fin (n + 1) (Fin n Real) Real) (a : Fin (n + 1) Real) (hv : i, v i Sstar) (hEq : verticalVector n = i, a i v i) : j, 0 < a j := by classical by_contra hpos have hle : i, a i 0 := by intro i by_contra hi exact hpos i, lt_of_not_ge hi have hneg : -(verticalVector n) = i, (-a i) v i := by calc -(verticalVector n) = -( i, a i v i) := by simp [hEq] _ = i, -(a i v i) := by simp [Finset.sum_neg_distrib] _ = i, (-a i) v i := by refine Finset.sum_congr rfl ?_ intro i hi simp have hlam : i, 0 -a i := by intro i exact neg_nonneg.mpr (hle i) have hineq : x0 ( i, (-a i) (v i).1) i, (-a i) * (v i).2 := conicSum_snd_nonneg_of_mem_intersectionOfHalfspaces (n := n) (Sstar := Sstar) (x0 := x0) hx0 v (fun i => -a i) hv hlam have hfst : ( i, (-a i) (v i).1) = 0 := by have hfst' := congrArg Prod.fst hneg simpa [fst_sum, verticalVector] using hfst' have hsnd : i, (-a i) * (v i).2 = -1 := by have hsnd' := congrArg Prod.snd hneg have hsnd'' : (-1 : Real) = i, (-a i) * (v i).2 := by simpa [snd_sum, verticalVector, mul_comm, mul_left_comm, mul_assoc] using hsnd' exact hsnd''.symm have hcontra : (0 : Real) -1 := by calc (0 : Real) = x0 ( i, (-a i) (v i).1) := by rw [hfst] simp _ i, (-a i) * (v i).2 := hineq _ = -1 := hsnd linarith

Express the vertical vector using a linearly independent sorry + 1 : (Unknown identifier `n`n + 1)-tuple.

Interior points of a closed halfspace satisfy the strict inequality.

lemma mem_interior_halfspace_le_imp_dot_lt {n : Nat} {v : Fin n Real} { : Real} {x : Fin n Real} (hv : v 0) (hx : x interior {y : Fin n Real | y v }) : x v < := by classical let f : (Fin n Real) [Real] Real := { toFun := fun y => dotProduct y v map_add' := by intro y z; simp map_smul' := by intro a y; simp [smul_eq_mul] } have hsurj : Function.Surjective f := by classical obtain i, hvi : i, v i 0 := by by_contra h have hv0 : v = 0 := by funext j by_contra hvj exact h j, hvj exact hv hv0 intro t refine Pi.single i (t / v i), ?_ have hdot : dotProduct v (Pi.single i (t / v i)) = v i * (t / v i) := by simp [dotProduct_single] have hdot' : dotProduct (Pi.single i (t / v i)) v = v i * (t / v i) := by simp [dotProduct_comm, hdot] have hmul : v i * (t / v i) = t := by field_simp [hvi] simpa [f, hmul] using hdot' have hcont : Continuous f := LinearMap.continuous_of_finiteDimensional f have hopen : IsOpenMap f := (LinearMap.isOpenMap_of_finiteDimensional (f := f) hsurj) have hpre : f ' interior (Set.Iic ) = interior (f ' Set.Iic ) := (IsOpenMap.preimage_interior_eq_interior_preimage (f := f) hopen hcont (Set.Iic )) have hx' : x f ' interior (Set.Iic ) := by have hx'' : x interior (f ' Set.Iic ) := by simpa [f, Set.preimage, Set.Iic] using hx simpa [hpre.symm] using hx'' have hx'' : f x interior (Set.Iic ) := by simpa [Set.preimage] using hx' have hx''' : f x Set.Iio := by simpa [interior_Iic] using hx'' simpa [Set.Iio, f] using hx'''

Interior points give strict inequalities for defining halfspaces.

lemma strict_dot_lt_of_mem_interior_intersectionOfHalfspaces {n : Nat} (Sstar : Set ((Fin n Real) Real)) (hC_ne : intersectionOfHalfspaces (n := n) Sstar ( : Set (Fin n Real))) {xbar : Fin n Real} (hxbar : xbar interior (intersectionOfHalfspaces (n := n) Sstar)) (hSstar0 : (0 : (Fin n Real) Real) Sstar) : p Sstar, dotProduct xbar p.1 < p.2 := by classical intro p hp by_cases hzero : p.1 = 0 rcases (Set.nonempty_iff_ne_empty.mpr hC_ne) with x0, hx0 have hx0' : q Sstar, x0 q.1 q.2 := by simpa [intersectionOfHalfspaces] using hx0 have hle : (0 : Real) p.2 := by have := hx0' p hp simpa [hzero] using this have hpne : p 0 := by intro h0 exact hSstar0 (by simpa [h0] using hp) have hp2ne : p.2 0 := by intro hmu apply hpne ext <;> simp [hzero, hmu] have hpos : 0 < p.2 := lt_of_le_of_ne hle (by simpa [eq_comm] using hp2ne) simpa [hzero] using hpos let C : Set (Fin n Real) := intersectionOfHalfspaces (n := n) Sstar have hsubset : C {x : Fin n Real | x p.1 p.2} := by intro x hx have hx' : q Sstar, x q.1 q.2 := by simpa [C, intersectionOfHalfspaces] using hx exact hx' p hp have hxbar' : xbar interior {x : Fin n Real | x p.1 p.2} := (interior_mono hsubset) hxbar exact mem_interior_halfspace_le_imp_dot_lt (v := p.1) ( := p.2) hzero hxbar'

Linear equivalences commute with convexHull.{u_1, u_2} ( : Type u_1) {E : Type u_2} [Semiring ] [PartialOrder ] [AddCommMonoid E] [Module E] : ClosureOperator (Set E)convexHull.

lemma convexHull_image_linearEquiv {E F : Type*} [AddCommGroup E] [Module E] [AddCommGroup F] [Module F] (e : E [] F) (D : Set E) : e '' (convexHull D) = convexHull (e '' D) := by simpa using (LinearMap.image_convexHull (f := e.toLinearMap) (s := D))

Linear equivalences commute with ConvexCone.hull.{u_2, u_4} (R : Type u_2) {M : Type u_4} [Semiring R] [PartialOrder R] [AddCommMonoid M] [SMul R M] (s : Set M) : ConvexCone R MConvexCone.hull on the level of sets.

lemma convexCone_hull_image_linearEquiv {E F : Type*} [AddCommGroup E] [Module E] [AddCommGroup F] [Module F] (e : E [] F) (D : Set E) : e '' (ConvexCone.hull D : Set E) = (ConvexCone.hull (e '' D) : Set F) := by classical apply Set.Subset.antisymm intro y hy rcases hy with x, hx, rfl have hsubset : D (ConvexCone.comap e.toLinearMap (ConvexCone.hull (e '' D)) : Set E) := by intro d hd have hd' : e d (ConvexCone.hull (e '' D) : Set F) := by exact (ConvexCone.subset_hull (R := ) (s := e '' D)) d, hd, rfl simpa using hd' have hx' : x (ConvexCone.comap e.toLinearMap (ConvexCone.hull (e '' D)) : Set E) := (ConvexCone.hull_min (s := D) (C := ConvexCone.comap e.toLinearMap (ConvexCone.hull (e '' D))) hsubset) hx have hx'' : e x (ConvexCone.hull (e '' D) : Set F) := by simpa using (ConvexCone.mem_comap (f := e.toLinearMap) (C := ConvexCone.hull (e '' D)) (x := x)).1 hx' exact hx'' intro y hy have hy' : e.symm y (ConvexCone.hull D : Set E) := by have hsubset : (e '' D) (ConvexCone.comap e.symm.toLinearMap (ConvexCone.hull D) : Set F) := by intro d hd rcases hd with x, hx, rfl have hx' : x (ConvexCone.hull D : Set E) := (ConvexCone.subset_hull (R := ) (s := D)) hx simpa using hx' have hy'' : y (ConvexCone.comap e.symm.toLinearMap (ConvexCone.hull D) : Set F) := (ConvexCone.hull_min (s := e '' D) (C := ConvexCone.comap e.symm.toLinearMap (ConvexCone.hull D)) hsubset) hy simpa using (ConvexCone.mem_comap (f := e.symm.toLinearMap) (C := ConvexCone.hull D) (x := y)).1 hy'' exact e.symm y, hy', by simp

Taking the cone hull after convexHull.{u_1, u_2} ( : Type u_1) {E : Type u_2} [Semiring ] [PartialOrder ] [AddCommMonoid E] [Module E] : ClosureOperator (Set E)convexHull does not change the cone.

lemma convexCone_hull_convexHull_eq {E : Type*} [AddCommGroup E] [Module E] (D : Set E) : (ConvexCone.hull (convexHull D) : Set E) = (ConvexCone.hull D : Set E) := by classical apply Set.Subset.antisymm have hsubset : convexHull D (ConvexCone.hull D : Set E) := by refine convexHull_min (ConvexCone.subset_hull (R := ) (s := D)) ?_ exact (ConvexCone.hull D).convex intro x hx exact (ConvexCone.hull_min (s := convexHull D) (C := ConvexCone.hull D) hsubset) hx have hsubset : D (ConvexCone.hull (convexHull D) : Set E) := by intro x hx have hx' : x convexHull D := (subset_convexHull ( := ) (s := D)) hx exact (ConvexCone.subset_hull (R := ) (s := convexHull D)) hx' intro x hx exact (ConvexCone.hull_min (s := D) (C := ConvexCone.hull (convexHull D)) hsubset) hx

A conic-combination certificate forces a finite intersection to lie in the target half-space.

lemma iInter_halfspaces_subset_halfspaceRep_of_conicCombination {n m : Nat} (r : HalfspaceRep n) (p : Fin m (Fin n Real) Real) (lam : Fin m Real) (hlam : i, 0 lam i) (hx : ( i, lam i (p i).1) = r.xStar) (hmu : ( i, lam i * (p i).2) r.muStar) : ( i : Fin m, {x : Fin n Real | x (p i).1 (p i).2}) r.set := by classical intro x hxmem have hx' : i, x (p i).1 (p i).2 := by have hx'' : i, x {x : Fin n Real | x (p i).1 (p i).2} := by simpa [Set.mem_iInter] using hxmem intro i simpa using hx'' i have hle_i : i, lam i * (x (p i).1) lam i * (p i).2 := by intro i exact mul_le_mul_of_nonneg_left (hx' i) (hlam i) have hsum : i, lam i * (x (p i).1) i, lam i * (p i).2 := by refine Finset.sum_le_sum ?_ intro i hi exact hle_i i have hdot : x ( i, lam i (p i).1) = i, lam i * (x (p i).1) := by calc x ( i, lam i (p i).1) = i, x lam i (p i).1 := by simpa using (dotProduct_sum (u := x) (s := (Finset.univ : Finset (Fin m))) (v := fun i => lam i (p i).1)) _ = i, lam i * (x (p i).1) := by simp [dotProduct_smul, smul_eq_mul] have hineq : x ( i, lam i (p i).1) i, lam i * (p i).2 := by simpa [hdot] using hsum have hineq' : x r.xStar i, lam i * (p i).2 := by simpa [hx] using hineq have hineq'' : x r.xStar r.muStar := le_trans hineq' hmu simpa [HalfspaceRep.set] using hineq''
